casebody.data:
February 3, 1970

No. —.

Sinatra v. New Jersey State Commission of Investigation et al. Bruce W. Kauffman and William T. Coleman, Jr., for applicant.

Application for stay pending appeal to United States Court of Appeals denied.

Mr. Justice Black, Mr. Justice Douglas, and Mr. Justice Marshall are of the opinion that the application should be granted. Mr. Justice Brennan took no part in the consideration or decision of this application.
